target: Daryl Hannah acted in this movie.
context: <user>  I want to find some attractive places to visit. I need your help to find the interesting one for me. <system>  Do you want to search for the attractive places in any particular City which is convenient to you to travel? <user>  Yes, find me something in SF. <system>  What about a Historical Landmark. Do you like Historical place? If so then you can try to visit Alcatraz which is the best place among the 10 that I have in my search list. <user>  Let me decide, before that I want to know whether this place is safe for Kids and also I want their contact number for my reference. <system>  Yes this is the safest place for children and you can contact them at any time using the phone number 415-561-4900. <user>  Thanks for the details. Search for some nice movies to watch at the same place. <system>  You can choose any one of the movie from Ad Astra, Brittany Runs a Marathon and Fiddler: A Miracle of Miracles.<user>  I choose Brittany Runs a Marathon. <system>  That is nice movie. Shall I book the tickets now?<user>  Do it later and I will ask you the same later. <system>  How can I assist you further?<user>  I want to watch a movie online and again search for good movies to watch online. <system>  This time you have any particular type of movie to search for?<user>  I like to watch Family movies as I need to watch it online in my place. <system>  What about Steel Magnolias or do you like The farewell?<user>  I prefer Steel Magnolias. <system>  Shall I play it now online for you?<user>  Yes, play it with subtitles in Hindi language. <system>  Please confirm to play the movie Steel Magnolias with subtitles in Hindi language.<user>  That is confirmed to proceed. <system>  The movie was started playing now and you can enjoy the same.<user>  What is the actor name? <system>
